fields.name: Formulario breve (text y date)
fields.xml: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <!-- <!DOCTYPE form SYSTEM 'form_def.dtd'> --> <form> <meta> <id /> <version>1</version> <name>Formulario de prueba</name> <author> <user>turawet</user> </author> </meta> <sections> <section> <id /> <name>Primera sección</name> <fields> <field> <id>1</id> <label>Etiqueta1</label> <type>TEXT</type> <required /> <properties> <property> <name>max_length</name> <value>10</value> </property> </properties> </field> <field> <id>2</id> <label>Fecha1</label> <type>DATE</type> <required /> <properties> <property> <name>format</name> <value>YYYY/MM/DD</value> </property> <property> <name>calendar</name> <value>MONTH_CALENDAR</value> </property> </properties> </field> <field> <id>3</id> <label>Campito</label> <type>TEXT</type> <required /> <properties> <property> <name>max_length</name> <value>120</value> </property> </properties> </field> <field> <id>4</id> <label>Otra fecha</label> <type>DATE</type> <required /> <properties> <property> <name>format</name> <value>DD/MM/YYYY</value> </property> <property> <name>calendar</name> <value>YEAR_CALENDAR</value> </property> </properties> </field> </fields> </section> </sections> </form>

fields.name: Formulario de prueba extenso (completo)
fields.xml: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <!DOCTYPE form SYSTEM 'form_def.dtd'> <form> <meta> <id /> <version>1</version> <name>Formulario de prueba</name> <author> <user>turawet</user> </author> </meta> <sections> <section> <id /> <name>Primera sección</name> <fields> <field> <id /> <label>Etiqueta1</label> <type>TEXT</type> <required /> <properties> <property> <name>max_length</name> <value>10</value> </property> </properties> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Etiqueta2</label> <type>TEXT</type> <properties> <property> <name>font</name> <value>Arial</value> </property> </properties> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Fecha1</label> <type>DATE</type> <required /> <properties> <property> <name>format</name> <value>YYYY/MM/DD</value> </property> <property> <name>calendar</name> <value>MONTH_CALENDAR</value> </property> </properties> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Radio1</label> <type>RADIO</type> <required /> <options> <option> <label>Masculino</label> <value>M</value> </option> <option> <label>Femenino</label> <value>F</value> </option> </options> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Combo1</label> <type>COMBO</type> <options> <option> <label>Opción 1</label> <value>O1</value> <default /> </option> <option> <label>Opción 2</label> <value>O2</value> </option> </options> <properties> <property> <name>size</name> <value>30</value> </property> </properties> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Check1</label> <type>CHECKBOX</type> <required /> <properties> <property> <name>widget</name> <value>TRISTATE</value> </property> </properties> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Imagen</label> <type>IMAGE</type> <required /> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Vídeo</label> <type>VIDEO</type> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Audio</label> <type>AUDIO</type> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Localización</label> <type>LOCATION</type> <properties> <property> <name>type</name> <value>COORDINATES</value> </property> </properties> </field> <group> <id /> <label>GRUPO</label> <required /> <field> <id /> <label>Nombre</label> <type>TEXT</type> </field> <field> <id /> <label>Apellido1</label> <type>TEXT</type> </field> </group> <group> <id /> <list /> <label>Galería de imágenes</label> <field> <id /> <label>Imágenes</label> <type>IMAGE_GALLERY</type> </field> <properties> <property> <name>max_photos</name> <value>6</value> </property> <property> <name>max_file_size</name> <value>128</value> </property> </properties> </group> </fields> </section> </sections> </form>
